item.title: 花旗财富部门首席信息官白林将离职
item.description: 花旗集团全球财富部门首席投资官（CIO）戴维-拜林（David Bailin）周一在 LinkedIn 上发帖称，他将于下月离职，此前他已在该行工作了 15 年。【原文：Citigroup's David Bailin, chief investment officer (CIO) at the global wealth division, will leave next month after 15 years at the bank, he said in a LinkedIn post on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称洛克希德公司赢得价值 170 亿美元的美国导弹防御合同
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社，洛克希德-马丁公司获得了一份价值 170 亿美元的合同，负责开发下一代拦截器，以防止美国遭受洲际弹道导弹袭击。【原文：Lockheed Martin has been awarded a $17 billion contract to develop the next generation of interceptors that would guard the United States against an intercontinental ballistic missile attack, two industry sources briefed on the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 开源组织称更多软件项目可能成为破坏目标
item.description: 两个开放源代码组织在周一发布的一份警报中说，最近一个身份不明的行为者试图破坏一个广泛使用的软件程序，这可能是数次试图颠覆互联网上关键数字基础设施的行为之一。【原文：The recent attempt by an unknown actor to sabotage a widely used software program may have been one of several attempts to subvert key pieces of digital infrastructure across the internet, two open source groups said in an alert published on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制迅速收缩，为近三年来最低
item.description: 周一，美联储从货币市场基金和其他机构吸收现金的一个重要机构的资金流入量急剧下降。【原文：A key Federal Reserve facility that takes in cash from money market funds and others saw inflows drop sharply on Monday.】

item.title: 美国机构将在听证会上调查航空公司忠诚度计划中的不公平行为
item.description: 美国运输部和消费者金融保护局的发言人周一表示，作为保护消费者免受欺骗和不公平行为侵害的努力的一部分，这两个机构将举行一次公开听证会，调查航空公司的忠诚度计划。【原文：As part of an effort to protect consumers from deceptive and unfair practices, the U.S. Department of Transportation and Consumer Financial Protection Bureau will hold a public hearing looking into airline loyalty programs, spokespeople for both agencies said on Monday.】

item.title: 赌场运营商米高梅起诉美国联邦贸易委员会，要求阻止对 2023 年黑客事件的调查
item.description: 美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）正在起诉美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission），以阻止调查去年黑客攻击事件对数据安全造成的影响。【原文：MGM Resorts International is suing the U.S. Federal Trade Commission to block a probe into the impact on data security of the dramatic hack that hobbled the casino operator last year.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，美国工人寻求创纪录的工资以考虑新工作
item.description: 纽约联储周一公布的最新数据显示，3月份美国人表示愿意接受的新工作最低工资创下历史新高。【原文：The lowest wage Americans said they were willing to accept to take a new job reached a record high in March, new data from the New York Federal Reserve showed on Monday.】

item.title: 通用汽车计划将总部迁至底特律的另一座大楼--消息来源
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周一表示，通用汽车公司在位于文艺复兴中心的河畔总部度过了 20 多年后，将把总部迁往底特律市中心更深处。【原文：General Motors is moving its headquarters deeper into downtown Detroit after spending more than 20 years in its riverfront home at the Renaissance Center, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: Evercore 策略师支持黯淡的标普 500 指数观点，预计盈利前景将更加疲软
item.description: Evercore ISI 的策略师认为，随着企业发布谨慎的前景展望，美国的盈利预期可能会减弱。【原文：U.S. earnings estimates are likely to weaken as companies issue cautious outlooks, according to Evercore ISI strategists, who stood by their view the S&P 500 will end the year well lower than current levels.】

item.title: Tapestry 与范思哲所有者卡普里的合并获得欧盟和日本批准
item.description: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 斥资 85 亿美元收购 Michael Kors 所有者 Capri Holdings 的交易已获得欧盟和日本监管部门的批准。【原文：Coach parent Tapestry's $8.5 billion deal to buy Michael Kors owner Capri Holdings has received regulatory clearance from the European Union and Japan, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉高级电池主管离职
item.description: 特斯拉动力总成和能源工程高级副总裁德鲁-巴格里诺（Drew Baglino）周一在社交网站 X 上发帖称，他在这家汽车制造商工作 18 年后将离职。【原文：Tesla's senior vice president of powertrain and energy engineering, Drew Baglino, is leaving after 18 years at the auto-maker, he said in a post on social media site X on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份商业库存回升
item.description: 在零售商和批发商强劲增长的带动下，2 月份美国商业库存有所增加，这表明库存投资可能会促进第一季度的经济增长。【原文：U.S. business inventories rose in February amid strong gains at retailers and wholesalers, suggesting that inventory investment could contribute to economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 汉莎航空以罢工和运力不足为由，下调 2024 年展望
item.description: 汉莎航空（Lufthansa）周一下调了 2024 年的盈利预期，将一系列罢工和产能提升慢于计划的原因归咎于盈利预警，导致其股价下跌超过 4%，创下五个月以来的新低。【原文：Lufthansa slashed its 2024 earnings outlook on Monday, blaming a series of strikes and a slower than planned ramp-up of capacity, in a profit warning that sent its share price sliding by more than 4% to a five-month low.】

item.title: 4 月份美国住宅建筑商信心保持稳定
item.description: 周一公布的数据显示，由于利率的不确定性使潜在购房者犹豫不决，美国房屋建筑商的信心在4月份保持稳定，达到去年7月以来的最高点，结束了连续四个月的上涨。【原文：U.S. homebuilder confidence held steady in April at the highest since last July, snapping four months of gains with uncertainty about interest rates keeping potential home buyers hesitant, data released Monday showed.】

item.title: 博通因 VMware 许可变更遭欧盟质询
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构要求美国芯片制造商博通公司（Broadcom）修改新收购的云计算公司 VMware 的许可条件，因为欧盟企业用户和一个行业组织对此提出了一系列投诉。【原文：U.S. chipmaker Broadcom is being asked by EU antitrust regulators about changes to newly acquired cloud computing company VMware's licensing conditions following complaints from a spate of EU business users and a trade group.】

item.title: Jio Financial 与 Blackrock 成立合资公司，以开展财富管理和经纪业务
item.description: 印度吉奥金融服务公司（Jio Financial Services）周一表示，该公司已与美国贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）成立合资企业，以建立财富管理和经纪业务。【原文：India's Jio Financial Services has entered into a joint venture with U.S.-based BlackRock Inc to set up a wealth management and broking business, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒称可能出售更多股票后股价下跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司周一股价暴跌 12%，延续了连续下跌的态势，此前该公司在一份监管文件中表示，可能在未来几个月内再出售数百万股股票。【原文：Shares of Donald Trump's social media company slumped 12% on Monday, extending their string of losses, after the company said in a regulatory filing that it could sell millions of additional shares in coming months.】

item.title: Adobe 探索与 OpenAI 合作，增加人工智能视频工具
item.description: Adobe 周一表示，该公司正处于允许在其广泛使用的视频编辑软件中使用 OpenAI 等第三方生成的人工智能工具的早期阶段。【原文：Adobe on Monday said it is in the early stages of allowing the use of third-party generative artificial intelligence tools from OpenAI and others inside of its widely used video editing software.】

item.title: 嘉信理财利润因利息支出增加而下降
item.description: 查尔斯-施瓦布（Charles Schwab）经纪公司周四表示，由于客户存款利息和借款利息的增加抵消了资产管理费激增带来的收益，该公司第一季度利润下降了 15%。【原文：Charles Schwab's first-quarter profit fell 15% as higher interest on clients' deposits and its borrowings offset gains from a surge in asset management fees, the brokerage said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份零售销售超出预期
item.description: 由于在线零售商的收入激增，美国 3 月份的零售销售额增幅超过预期，这进一步证明第一季度结束时的经济形势稳健。【原文：U.S. retail sales increased more than expected in March amid a surge in receipts at online retailers, further evidence that the economy ended the first quarter on solid ground.】

item.title: EQT 将向 Equinor USA 出售宾夕法尼亚州东北部的部分天然气资产
item.description: EQT 周一表示，将以 5 亿美元现金和部分资产向 Equinor USA Onshore Properties 出售其在宾夕法尼亚州东北部非运营天然气资产的 40% 权益。【原文：EQT said on Monday it would sell 40% interest in its non-operated natural gas assets in northeast Pennsylvania to Equinor USA Onshore Properties for $500 million in cash and some assets.】

item.title: 华尔街券商开始报道 Reddit，对用户增长持怀疑态度
item.description: 摩根大通（J.P.Morgan）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）开始对 Reddit 进行评级，评级等同于 "持有"，因为他们在等待这家社交媒体公司用户增长情况的明朗化，同时继续看好广告收入增长和人工智能（AI）计划。【原文：J.P.Morgan and Morgan Stanley started coverage on Reddit with equivalent to "hold" ratings, as they wait for clarity on the social media company's user growth, while staying bullish on ad-revenue growth and artificial intelligence (AI) initiatives.】

item.title: 皮德蒙特锂公司获得北卡罗来纳州项目采矿许可
item.description: 矿商皮德蒙特锂业公司（Piedmont Lithium）表示，该公司已从北卡罗来纳州监管机构获得了拖延已久的锂矿开工许可，这将进一步促进美国电动汽车电池组件的供应。【原文：Miner Piedmont Lithium said that it had received a long-delayed permit for starting the construction its lithium mine from North Carolina regulators in a further boost to the supplies of the electric vehicle battery component in the United States.】

item.title: 高盛投资银行业务强劲，利润跃升 28
item.description: 高盛集团周一发布报告称，受承销和交易复苏提振，其投资银行部门第一季度利润增长 28%。【原文：Goldman Sachs' profit rose 28% in the first quarter, buoyed by a recovery in underwriting and dealmaking that boosted its investment banking unit, it reported on Monday.】

item.title: Meta 将暂时关闭土耳其社交媒体平台 Threads
item.description: Meta Platforms 周一表示，将从 4 月 29 日起暂时关闭其在土耳其的社交媒体平台 Threads，以遵守土耳其竞争管理机构的临时命令。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Monday it would temporarily shut down its social media platform Threads in Turkey from April 29 to comply with an interim order of the Turkish competition authority.】

item.title: 独家报道：英国石油公司电动汽车充电部门裁员，降低全球雄心
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）的消息人士称，由于对商用电动汽车车队快速增长的押注没有得到回报，该公司已经裁减了超过十分之一的电动汽车充电业务员工，并将其撤出多个市场。【原文：BP has cut over a tenth of the workforce in its electric vehicle charging business and pulled it out of several markets after a bet on rapid growth in commercial EV fleets didn't pay off, company sources said.】

item.title: 复仇者联盟：终章复仇者联盟：终章》制片人将亚马逊高管纳入工作室团队
item.description: 复仇者联盟：终局之战》的联合导演乔-罗素（Joe Russo）找到了一个令人难忘的环境，来接触他与兄弟创立的独立制片厂的最新员工：复仇者联盟：终结者》（Avengers: Endgame）的联合导演乔-鲁索（Joe Russo）找到了一个令人难忘的环境，来为他与兄弟创立的独立制片厂招聘最新的员工。鲁索邀请亚马逊米高梅工作室的高管克里斯-布雷顿（Chris Brearton）和他一起参加在西班牙潘普洛纳举行的奔牛节。【原文：Joe Russo, co-director of "Avengers: Endgame," found a memorable setting to approach the latest hire for the independent studio he founded with his brother. Russo invited Chris Brearton, an executive at Amazon.com's MGM studio, to join him at the Running of the Bulls in Pamplona, Spain.】

item.title: 现在是在美国出售房屋的最佳时机
item.description: 如果您要在美国出售房屋，您可能会想知道何时将房屋投放市场才能获得最佳价格。【原文：If you are selling a home in the U.S., you may wonder when to put it on the market and get the best price.】

item.title: 联合健康遭黑客攻击，第一季度财报悬而未决
item.description: 分析师表示，UnitedHealth 的技术系统（包括管理处方和医疗索赔的系统）遭到网络攻击破坏后，预计其首份财报将录得更高的医疗成本。【原文：UnitedHealth is expected to record higher medical costs in its first earnings report since a cyberattack disrupted its technology systems including those that manage prescription and medical claims, analysts said.】

item.title: 宝洁公司涨价令购物者钱包缩水
item.description: 个人护理产品价格上涨可能会抑制美国人购买大品牌家用产品的习惯，从而对全球最大的包装商品制造商之一宝洁公司构成威胁。【原文：Rising prices of personal care products could quash Americans' habit of buying big-brand-name items for their household pantries, posing a threat to Procter & Gamble , one of the world's biggest makers of packaged goods.】
